description: Guernsey says it has created new rules to allow French vessels to fish in Bailiwick waters in 2020.
title: French condemn Guernsey 'ban on fishing boats'
title_page: French condemn Guernsey 'ban on fishing boats' - BBC News
maintext: But, to provide stability for French vessels in Bailiwick waters, the governments of Guernsey, Alderney and Sark implemented the package of measures, which will allow French vessels who previously fished in the Bailiwick waters to continue to do so.
